title: First, Russia came for Navalny, then his people and organizations. Now, his lawyer has been arrested.
content:
1. First, Russia came for Navalny, then his people and organizations. Now, his lawyer has been arrested.  The Washington Post
  2. Navalny appears in court for first time since ending hunger strike, saying 'I'm just an awful skeleton'  CNN
  3. Visibly gaunt Alexei Navalny makes first public appearance since hunger strike  CBS This Morning
  4. Gaunt Navalny attacks Putin as network is disbanded  BBC News
  5. Putin Finds Ally in China's TikTok in Crackdown on Critics  Bloomberg
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: まず、ロシアはナバルニーを逮捕し、次に彼の人々や組織を逮捕しました。そして今度は、彼の弁護士が逮捕されました。
首先，俄罗斯来找纳瓦尔尼，然后是他的人民和组织。现在，他的律师也被逮捕了。
首先，俄羅斯來找納瓦爾尼，然後是他的人民和組織。現在，他的律師也被逮捕了。
